author: davidein
content:
After the One Drop left me feeling like Teddy KGB (I feel so unsatisfied)
http://t.co/w6PQrw4pc0, today I plan to last > 1 hr.

author: davidein
content: I've made it twice as far as in One Drop. Mission accomplished!  I'm practicing my folding muscle. Just below starting 30k

author: davidein
content: I'm a straight magnet.  My QQ ran into a 2-3-4 flop.  Opp had a-5.  I held my loss to 12k. 2nd break 18k left. I'm improving!
